actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. With written report No. 102-47.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 73.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to update Senate Resolution 219 (95TH Congress, 2d Session) relating to the Senior Citizen Intern Program.

summary.text: Amends Senate Resolution 219, 95th Congress (relating to the Senior Citizen Intern Program) to apply to the interns the same limitations and restrictions for payment of compensation and travel applicable to Senators and employees. Authorizes an outside vendor to provide travel and per diem expenses only of senior citizen interns in the Program subject to approval by the Committee on Rules and Administration.

titles.title: A resolution to update Senate Resolution 219 (95TH Congress, 2d Session) relating to the Senior Citizen Intern Program.
